mapper.insert: insert into t_proj_log ( create_date, modify_date, proj_id, user_id, pub_date, title, content ) values ( #{createDate}, #{modifyDate}, #{projId}, #{userId}, #{pubDate}, #{title}, #{content} )
mapper.select: select l.id as log_id, l.proj_id, l.pub_date, l.title, l.content, d.nick_name from t_proj_log l inner join t_user_detail d on l.user_id = d.user_id where l.proj_id = #{projId} order by l.pub_date desc limit #{pager.start},#{pager.pageSize}
select count(id) from t_proj_log where proj_id = #{projId}
